## Library

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Making a vector 

```{r}
dogs <- c("teddy", "khora", "waffle", "banjo")
class(dogs)
```

## Numeric vector

```{r}
weights <- c(50, 55, 25, 35)
class(weights)
```

## Integer vector

```{r}
dog_age <- c(5L, 6L, 7L)
class(dog_age)
```

Integer to numeric

```{r}
is.numeric(dog_age)

```

## Dataframe

```{r}
dog_food <- c(teddy = "purina", kora = "alpo", waffle = "fancy_feast", banjo = "blue diamond")
dog_food

```

dog_food[2]
